data.Name: Diane Loud
data.staff_bio: Diane Loud, M.Ed. has ten years of experience working with individuals with disabilities. The range of services she has provided includes independent living support, mental health services, and job search support for individuals with persistent mental illness. She has also provided training and education to businesses on employing individuals with disabilities, as well as training to a local womenâ€™s center on improving service delivery to women with disabilities.
